Module contents¶

antivirus.reactToAMQPMessage(message, UUID)[source]¶

React to given (AMQP) message. message is usually expected to be collections.namedtuple() structure filled with all necessary data.

Parameters:
  • message (object) – One of the request objects defined in structures.
  • UUID (str) – Unique ID of received message.
Returns:

object – Response class from structures.
Raises:

ValueError – if bad type of message structure is given.
